name: Don't Break It
description:
You are a game tester and just joined a Zowie Jam team.

The team main developer asks you to test the game so far, but it is not completed. He gives you access to the game Console so you can make your ways throw the levels.

This is a puzzle games where you will have to expermient with the console commands to find a way to beat the levels. Will you be able to clear all 10 of them and make it to the final surprise?
